definition: a United States dry measure equal to 4 pecks or 2152.42 cubic inches, to restore by replacing a part or putting together what is torn or broken
details:
noun
- a United States dry measure equal to 4 pecks or 2152.42 cubic inches
- a British imperial capacity measure (liquid or dry) equal to 4 pecks
verb
- to restore by replacing a part or putting together what is torn or broken
= example: to restore by replacing a part or putting together what is torn or broken
= synonyms: fix
